title: Latency Issue?  44 - 49ms but feels much worse
body:
Basically I got new internet a couple of days ago and it is slightly worse but it is cheaper.  I used to get 32ms every game and now i am at 44 - 49 but I seem to be noticing a big difference than there should be.  It feels like I have a slight delay on everything I do.  maybe the delay is 0.25 seconds but it is affecting my ability to dodge skill shots and I appear to get minion blocked much easier as well.  I would link a game I played as vayne where I first discovered the problem but the match history isnt working atm.  I do not know if I have suddenly gotten much worse at the game or my new internet provider is affecting my ability to play.  I have a good pc btw, i7 3770k 3.50ghz with a gtx 1060 and 8gb of ram.  I play at 144fps on the highest settings but with shadows off and name tags off.  Some times the framerate drops to around 119 as well but I would assume that is an unrelated problem.

I'm just looking to see if anyone is had similar issues.  Where maybe it says a specific amount of ping but feels much worse.  Thanks for reading and I would appreciate any suggestions of help.

replies.body: If you have delays but good pign, then you could be suffering from other connection issues like packet loss.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an over view of your network during these matches.  This should give us better context on what's going on.  Let me know the results!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=aJXRXMIQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-22T00:27:47.242+0000)
>
> If you have delays but good pign, then you could be suffering from other connection issues like packet loss.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an over view of your network during these matches.  This should give us better context on what's going on.  Let me know the results!

ok ill try it thanks
its not only you   i never have had lag since i got my internet   and last 2 days    ping spikes hooridly  and major packet loss
